description:
In the Stamford, Connecticut, area, when a serious accident has left you injured, turn to the experienced personal injury lawyers of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP. Our law firm has more than 60 years of combined experience helping people fight for the compensation they need. Over those decades of service, our lawyers have secured nearly $500 million in compensation.

The representation we provide focuses on exceptional personal service as its core. We understand how shocking and distressing serious accidents are for those who have been through them, and we work to let our clients know that we are going to do everything we can to help them recover. We work to give our clients peace of mind and confidence that their case is receiving the attention it deserves at all times.

In addition to our focus on personal service, we always focus on building the strongest case for our clients. Our exceptional skill in trial preparation leaves us well positioned as we work to negotiate a settlement. If a settlement is out of reach, that same superior trial preparation always allows us to enter litigation with confidence.

We are committed to providing our clients with the exceptional representation they need. To schedule a free initial consultation with one of the Stamford personal injury attorneys of Sakkas, Cahn & Weiss, LLP, call 212-571-7171.
